chunk_text: Employee Handbook – Human Resources Policies This handbook defines the human resources policies applicable to all employees of the organization. These policies are designed to establish clear expectations, ensure consistency in decision-making, and promote a professional, inclusive, and productive work environment. Employees are expected to read, understand, and comply with the policies outlined in this document. The organization reserves the right to modify these policies at any time to meet business, legal, or operational requirements.
